org.pac4j.oauth.client

Class WordPressClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pac4j.core.util.InitializableWebObject
      • org.pac4j.core.client.BaseClient<C,U>
        • org.pac4j.core.client.IndirectClient<OAuthCredentials,U>
          • org.pac4j.oauth.client.BaseOAuthClient<U,com.github.scribejava.core.oauth.OAuth20Service,com.github.scribejava.core.model.OAuth2AccessToken>
            • org.pac4j.oauth.client.BaseOAuth20Client<WordPressProfile>
              • org.pac4j.oauth.client.WordPressClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Client<OAuthCredentials,WordPressProfile>

    public class WordPressClient
extends BaseOAuth20Client<WordPressProfile>

    This class is the OAuth client to authenticate users in WordPress.

    It returns a WordPressProfile.

    More information at http://developer.wordpress.com/docs/oauth2/

    Since:
    1.1.0
    Author:
    Jerome Leleu
